document.full_text: citigroup  has hired a top european oil banker from ubs  for a senior job in houston, texas, spokespeople for the two banks said, in its latest raid on the swiss bank's energy team.
document.title: citi hires senior ubs oil banker hobbs
lines_and_colors: citigroup  has hired a top european oil banker from ubs  for a senior job in houston, texas, spokespeople for the two banks said, in its latest raid on the swiss bank's energy team.
